newsitem.title: USA: Brazil coffee areas seen free of damaging cold.
newsitem.headline: Brazil coffee areas seen free of damaging cold.

text.p: No damaging cold is in sight for the next five days in Brazil's coffee growing regions, independent forecaster Weather Services Corporation said.
Monday temperatures will be near to above normal, with lows of 50-68 degrees.
Conditions may be slightly cooler by Wednesday, and then milder on Thursday and Friday.
